Version 2.1.51 - Real-time Webhook Data Sync

Changes

  • Real-time data sync: Plugin now pushes Moodle data changes (users, courses, enrollments, grades, completions, calendar events) to SmartLearning via webhooks in real-time.
  • Bulk sync on activation: Full data push (paginated, 100 records/page) triggered on system/company activation.
  • New event observers: course_created, course_deleted, user_graded, calendar_event_created/updated/deleted.
  • Deduplication: Plugin-initiated actions (user creation, enrollment via API) skip webhook to avoid duplicates.

Previous Versions

  • v2.1.50: get_companies: return all user companies for chat filters
  • v2.1.49: get_companies: return token's company for company-scoped tokens
  • v2.1.48: get_companies: allow company-scoped tokens (not admin-only)
  • v2.1.47: Report generation API (variable-based dynamic reports)
  • v2.1.46: Updated default API URL to api-inbox.smartlxp.com
  • v2.1.45: Activation flow alignment, HMAC verification, new APIs
